nome: Sekai Seifuku: Bouryaku no Zvezda - Shin Zvezda Daisakusen

metadata_completo.titulo_oficial: Sekai Seifuku: Bouryaku no Zvezda - Shin Zvezda Daisakusen
metadata_completo.titulo_ingles: World Conquest Zvezda Plot: Operation New Zvezda
metadata_completo.sinopse:
The unaired 13th episode of Sekai Seifuku: Bouryaku no Zvezda that is included in Volume 7 of the BD/DVD. In this special, Kate and company will launch their own idol unit.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
